snippet: Revenue for bourbon and Tennessee whiskey rose by 9.6 percent to $2.7 billion last year, the Distilled Spirits Council said.
abstract: Producers of Kentucky bourbon and Tennessee whiskey report 2014 sales of $2.7 billion, up 9.6 percent from year-earlier period.
lead_paragraph: Revenue for bourbon and Tennessee whiskey rose by 9.6 percent to $2.7 billion last year, the Distilled Spirits Council said.

headline.main: U.S. Bourbon and Whiskey Record More Sales Growth
headline.print_headline: U.S. Bourbon and Whiskey Record More Sales Growth
